headline.main: U.S. MOVES TO SEIZE ITALIAN SHIP AT CANAL; Sabotage Charges Are Pending Against Biancamano Officers

lead_paragraph: BALBOA, C.Z., Nov. 7 -- That the Conte Biancamano, 23-000-ton Italian luxury liner, may eventually fly the United States flag was indicated by the action taken yesterday, apparently as a preliminary step to forfeiture to the United States.
abstract: U S Customs Service seizes Ital SS Conte Biancamano, Balboa, C Z; sabotage case status discussed
snippet: BALBOA, C.Z., Nov. 7 -- That the Conte Biancamano, 23-000-ton Italian luxury liner, may eventually fly the United States flag was indicated by the action taken yesterday, apparently as a preliminary step to forfeiture to the United States....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
